clearcontrol.microscope.state

Interface AcquisitionStateInterface<M extends MicroscopeInterface<Q>,Q extends QueueInterface>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - microscope type
    Q - queue type
    All Superinterfaces:
    HasChangeListenerInterface<AcquisitionStateInterface<M,Q>>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcquisitionStateBase, TestState

    public interface AcquisitionStateInterface<M extends MicroscopeInterface<Q>,Q extends QueueInterface>
extends NameableInterface, HasChangeListenerInterface<AcquisitionStateInterface<M,Q>>
    Acquisition state interface
    Author:
    royer
